headline: Holland America Line Introduces Enhanced Denali Lodge and Free Dining Plan for 2027 Alaska Cruisetour Season
summary: As Holland America Line prepares to celebrate 80 years of exploring Alaska, the cruise line is unveiling its 2027 Cruisetour season with fresh enhancements. Travelers can pair an iconic Alaska cruise with an unforgettable journey into Denali National Park and Canada's Yukon, featuring an expanded Denali Lodge and a new inclusive dining package — free for guests booking with the Have It All Early Booking Bonus — that delivers local flavors, multiple dining venues and added value. thumbnail.caption: Guests on a Holland America Line cruisetour enjoy the scenic landscape of interior Alaska while riding the McKinley Explorer to Denali. Holland America Line’s Cruisetours combine an Alaska cruise with an inland journey.
